Tool

NameProfiles from Lines
ID4
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2006
Specificationgrid

Description

Create profiles from a grid based DEM for each line of a lines layer.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
DEM Grid (input)DEM
Values (*)Grid list (optional input)VALUESAdditional values that shall be saved to the output table.
Lines Shapes (input)LINES
Output
Profiles (*)Shapes (optional output)PROFILE
Profiles (*)Shapes list (optional output)PROFILES
Options
NameTable fieldNAMENaming for split lines
Each Line as new ProfileBooleanSPLITDefault: 0
(*) optional
